StyleCategoryDef.label: Anequinan
StyleCategoryDef.description: The desert warrior style of northern Elsweyr, emphasizing survival in harsh badlands and nomadic warrior traditions. Features practical designs with tribal motifs and earth tones suited for desert camouflage.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Pellitine
StyleCategoryDef.description: The refined merchant style of southern Elsweyr, reflecting the prosperous river valleys and trade cities. Features elegant designs with rich colors and sophisticated patterns that display wealth and diplomatic status.
